questions.question: What are your opening hours?
questions.answer: We are open from 11 AM to 10 PM, Monday to Sunday. The kitchen closes at 9:30 PM.

questions.question: Where are you located?
questions.answer: We're at 123 Main Street, Downtown. Get directions here: https://maps.google.com/?q=123+Main+Street+Downtown

questions.question: Can I make a reservation?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can book a table online at https://restaurant.com/reservations or call us at (123) 456-7890.

questions.question: Do you have vegetarian options?
questions.answer: Yes! We have a dedicated vegetarian section on our menu. View full menu: https://restaurant.com/menu

questions.question: What are today's specials?
questions.answer: Today's specials include Grilled Salmon with lemon herb butter and Seasonal Wild Mushroom Risotto.

questions.question: Do you offer takeout?
questions.answer: Yes! Place takeout orders online at https://restaurant.com/takeout or call us at (123) 456-7890.

questions.question: What delivery apps do you work with?
questions.answer: We're on Uber Eats, DoorDash, and Grubhub.

questions.question: Can I book a private dining room?
questions.answer: Yes! We have private spaces for 10-50 guests. Contact events@restaurant.com for details.

questions.question: Do you have parking?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary valet parking. Street parking is also available after 6 PM.

questions.question: Is the restaurant wheelchair accessible?
questions.answer: Yes, we have ramp access, wide aisles, and accessible restrooms.

questions.question: Do you have gift cards?
questions.answer: Yes! Purchase gift cards at https://restaurant.com/giftcards

questions.question: Can I speak to a human?
questions.answer: Of course! Call us at (123) 456-7890 during business hours.
